channel.title: Comunistando — Feed Geral
channel.description: Breaking News do mundo socialista (feed geral)

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: International group praises green revival
item.description: A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

item.title: Scroll-Shaped Skyscraper Design Wins Vote to Replace Iconic Novy Arbat Building in Moscow
item.description: The skyscraper will replace the Soviet-era Council for Mutual Economic Assistance building, which was deemed structurally unsound in October.

item.title: Russia’s Top Investigator Orders Rescue of Climber in Kyrgyzstan
item.description: Natalia Nagovitsyna has been stranded at an altitude of around 7,000 meters for two weeks after breaking her leg while descending Victory Peak on Aug. 12.

item.title: Russia to Quit Europe’s Anti-Torture Convention
item.description: The rights group Crew Against Torture warned the withdrawal could worsen conditions in Russian prisons, where reports of torture are already common.

item.title: Tribunal alemán enfrenta a Apple por publicidad engañosa
item.description: Berlín, 26 ago (Prensa Latina) La Audiencia Provincial de Fráncfort prohibió hoy a la compañía tecnológica estadounidense Apple publicidad verde engañosa de su reloj de pulsera inteligente. The post Tribunal alemán enfrenta a Apple por publicidad engañosa firs

item.title: Siria crea entidad para recuperar e impulsar su sistema educativo
item.description: Damasco, 26 ago (Prensa Latina) Las autoridades sirias anunciaron hoy la creación del Consejo Superior de Educación, un órgano rector destinado a coordinar, unificar y modernizar el sistema educativo nacional, en un esfuerzo por adaptar la enseñanza a los reto

item.title: Dólar vuelve a caer bajo medidas de Trump
item.description: Londres, 26 ago (Prensa Latina) El dólar volvió a caer hoy de acuerdo con los reportes de los operadores financieros, que señalaron como una de las causas las medidas del presidente estadounidense, Donald Trump. The post Dólar vuelve a caer bajo medidas de Tru

item.title: Peacock Chosen as Symbol of 12th National Games
item.description: (KPL) The Organizing Committee of the 12th National Games has officially adopted the design, logo, mascot, and motto for the upcoming “Vientiane Games 2025.” The committee announced that the lucky animal, the peacock, will serve as the symbol of the event.
